charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_010:
Thank you for the battle, love! Did you have a bit
of fun yourself?
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_020: We were so close to winning...
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_030:
But it’s been a while since I had a battle this fun!
We’re gonna win next time!
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_050: I do look forward to your next visit.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_060:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Were you
watching our battle?
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_070: Let me give you a little explanation.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_080:
The type of battle you just saw is called a
Rotation Battle.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_090:
In this format, both Trainers send out three
Pokémon that can rotate positions throughout the
battle.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_100: At the Battle Maison, I am in charge of this format.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_110: My Virizion is also adept at Rotation Battles.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_120:
Apparently there is a legend in Unova that says
Virizion protected its friends alongside Cobalion
and Terrakion...
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_130:
Even in my Rotation Battles, those three Pokémon
show off incredible teamwork when they support
each other.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_140:
Maybe that’s because they have as strong a bond
as the legends say.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_0301_150:
Why did you choose Virizion as
your partner?
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_0402_180: Are you interested in why I chose Virizion?
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_190:
The reason I chose Virizion out of the three is
quite simple.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_200: Virizion’s aura goes so well with my outfit.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_210:
I’m sure the customers enjoy the combination we
make together, don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_220:
I have three sisters, and the whole family chips in
to help run the Battle Maison.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_230:
I want to learn from Virizion and the others and
continue livening up the Battle Maison with
my sisters.
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_240:
When you have a chance, please come and visit
the Battle Maison, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_250:
If you’re free for a time, come on by. ♪
If you’re bored for a while, stop on in. ♪
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_260:
Battle till you burst, oh, won’t you try. ♪
Want to battle? The Battle Maison’s fine. ♪
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_270:
We Battle Chatelaines will be looking forward
to your next visit to the Battle Maison...
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_290: What kind of battling was that, Nita?!
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_300: It’s your fault for not following me, Dana!
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_330: Whose side are you on, Evelyn?!
charaepi_ch0207_00_lematin/2301_1201_390:
I’m very sorry. I must have a...discussion with my
wee sisters.
